linear.vector



struct RowVector(T);
auto row(T)(T[] payload);
Row vector.

auto opIndexOpAssign(string op)(typeof(this) rhs) if (op == "*");
auto opBinary(string op)(typeof(this) rhs) if (op == "*");
Componentwise product.

auto opOpAssign(string op)(typeof(this) rhs) if (op == "+" || op == "-");
auto opBinary(string op)(typeof(this) rhs) if (op == "+" || op == "-");
Vector addition and subtraction.

auto opOpAssign(string op)(T rhs) if (op == "*" || op == "/");
auto opBinary(string op)(T rhs) if (op == "*" || op == "/");
auto opBinaryRight(string op)(T lhs) if (op == "*");
Scalar multiplication and division.

auto opBinary(string op)(ColumnVector!T rhs) if (op == "*");
auto opBinary(string op)(T[] rhs) if (op == "*");
inner product.

For special element-wise operation.

Copy.

auto opBinary(string op)(typeof(this) rhs) if (op == "*");
